page.title: 04THE SCOUTS.
page.content: {The Scouts}in Penistone were formally 2nd Stocksbridge now it is called 17th Barnsley (Penistone).The new H.Q buliding is at Wentworth Road,Penistone.It opened in April 1983 and replaced the prefabricated building which was destroyed by a heavy{snow}fall in April 1981, causing the roof to collapse. Just recently the Scouts have bought an X_Army Bedford Tiger Cub,at first the Scouts painted it green,but now it is going to be painted yellow,green and blue.The Scouts go on lots of activities.Their are forty Scouts at this troop.
